DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of Kinesio Taping on the position sense of shoulder after muscle fatigue.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Muscle Fatigue and Kinesio Taping on Shoulder Position Sense
DOC.criteria: Healthy participants prior shoulder surgery shoulder injury that required rehabilitation in the last 2 years shoulder dislocation ligamentous laxity
